channel.title: Art Direction on Lucas de Lima
channel.description: Recent content in Art Direction on Lucas de Lima

item.title: Roper Motorcycle
item.description: A poster that I created for Espa√ßo Roper to advertise a rock concert that the bar would sponsor.

item.title: Aipim
item.description: Editorial Design for a article in the Aipim magazine.

item.title: T-Virus
item.description: A Resident Evil T-Virus done as a practice for modeling, shading and lighting. The final render was done entirely in Blender, with post-production in Photoshop.

item.title: Cyberpunk Woman
item.description: A digital retouch of a cyberpunk woman. It was created to be the poster of a college design event. It ended up being replaced by another piece that I made.
